8 Rainbow flag-wielding lunatic goes on rampage vandalizing churches across New York City (www.dailymail.co.uk) posted 49 minutes ago by 1DontTreadOnMe1 1 comments award share report block Rainbow flag-wielding lunatic goes on rampage vandalizing NYC churches The vandal, who draped himself in a LGBTQ pride flag, is accused of spray painting hateful messages on three churches in Queens last month. www.dailymail.co.uk
